document.description: The package also includes utensils, plates, napkins, a warming stand ... the service is good and fast, but you don't feel like you in a fast food restaurant.

Ann Arbor, MI Metro > Ann Arbor > Restaurants > Qdoba Mexican Grill Qdoba Mexican Grill (734) 332-1489 2252 S Main St , Ann Arbor , MI | Directions 48103 42.252900 -83.749800 View Website Menu Share Save Own this Business? Thumbs Up Thumbs Down ? 67 % 100 7 3 Votes Add a Photo Neighborhoods: Bach Price: $ Categories: Restaurants Cuisine: Mexican View More Restaurant Special Features: Cheap Eats , Lunch Spot Payment Methods: MasterCard, Discover, Visa, American Express View Less Site Feedback Overview Tips (7) Photos (0) Write a Tip for Qdoba Mexican Grill Sign in to Write a Tip Write a Tip... optional
Tips for Qdoba Mexican Grill Doesn't Recommend Contributor Joined 9 years ago August 09, 2008 Editorial Review. National fast-food chain serves burritos, taco salads, quesadillas, soup and nachos; fax orders, catering and gift certificates available. 0 Heart Recommends kee22 Joined 6 years ago 4.0 November 24, 2006 Good food. Qdoba's food is quite tastey. I especially like their burritos. The last time I went, I had a steak burrito that was pretty good. However, I wish that you could have the option of having refried beans and not just black or pinto beans. Also, their chips and sala are addicting. … View More View Less 0 Heart Recommends brandismom Joined 8 years ago 5.0 July 11, 2004 Brandismom. The food is great, the service is good and fast, but you don't feel like you in a fast food restaurant. 0 Heart See more tips for Qdoba Mexican Grill Write a Tip for Qdoba Mexican Grill Sign in to Write a Tip Write a Tip... optional
